context: Tests whether the agent knows the specific deterministic patch values used in codeflash's pytest plugin and the subprocess-based test execution architecture.

checklist.name: Subprocess isolation
checklist.description: States that tests run in a subprocess to isolate the test environment from the main codeflash process, NOT in the same process

checklist.name: Fixed time value
checklist.description: References the specific fixed timestamp 1761717605.108106 for time.time() or the fixed datetime 2021-01-01 02:05:10 UTC for datetime.now()

checklist.name: Fixed UUID value
checklist.description: References the specific fixed UUID 12345678-1234-5678-9abc-123456789012 for uuid4/uuid1

checklist.name: Random seed
checklist.description: States that random is seeded with 42 (NOT a different seed value)

checklist.name: Plugin blocklists
checklist.description: Mentions that behavioral tests block specific pytest plugins (at least 2 of: benchmark, codspeed, xdist, sugar) to ensure deterministic execution
